report.title: Regions list
report.description: A list of Regions. Currently used for drop-down Region filters which are unable to provide location type parameters to a report using population_call. See the shorewatch_records.xml report at the time of writing for an example.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id and lw.deleted=false JOIN termlists_terms tt ON tt.id = l.location_type_id JOIN termlists tl ON tl.id=tt.termlist_id AND tl.title = 'Location types' JOIN terms tm ON tm.id=tt.term_id AND tm.term = 'Region' #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter#
